content:
DataTableNewRowEventHandler Delegate

Definition

Represents the method that handles the stem.Data.DataTable.NewRow* method.

In this Article

public delegate void DataTableNewRowEventHandler(object sender, DataTableNewRowEventArgs e);
Inheritance
Object
Delegate
DataTableNewRowEventHandler

Remarks

When you create a DataTableNewRowEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. The event handler is called whenever the event occurs until you remove the delegate. For more information about delegates, see NIB: Events and Delegates.
